decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Site Location Plan (Drawing No. 2248-D00-00 P1),  Existing Block Plan 2248-D01-00 P1), Existing Ground Floor Plan(2248-D01-10 P1), Existing First Floor Plan(2248-D01-11 P1), Existing Second Floor Plan(2248-D01-12 P1), Existing Roof Plan (2248-D01-13 P1), Existing Sections (2248-D01-20 P1), Existing North Elevation Plan (2248-D01-30 P1), Existing East Elevation Plan (2248-D01-31 P1), Existing South Elevation Plan (2248-D01-32 P1), Existing West Elevation Plan (2248-D01-33 P1), Proposed Block Plan (2248-D01-50 P1), Proposed Ground Floor Plan (2248-D01-60 P1), Proposed First Floor Plan (2248-D01-61 P1), Proposed Second Floor Plan (2248-D01-62 P1), Proposed Roof Plan (2248-D01-63 P1), Proposed Sections (2248-D01-70 P1), Proposed North Elevation (2248-D01-80 P1), Proposed East Elevation (2248-D01-81 P1), Proposed South Elevation (2248-D01-82 P1), Proposed West Elevation (2248-D01-83 P1)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Replacement of existing roof with metal roofing system; installation of photovoltaic panels; and installation of maintenance access ladders, gantry, balustrades, sprung gates and associated works.
